duties_responsibilities.duty: Drives store sales and growth by personally selling to customers, engaging with customers, and responding effectively to their cues.
Delivers a friendly and efficient cash wrap experience, processing customer transactions accurately and efficiently.
Processes merchandise and maintains back room and under stock to brand standards, replenishes merchandise to brand standards, including markdowns, re-tickets, and the mark-out of stock process.
Assists with floorset activity, executes floor set proficiently, and understands and adheres to brand standards.
Drives top-line store sales results and maintains a focus on bras as the premier product differentiator.
Creates customer awareness of programs available to them, and sets personal goals while tracking individual and team performance to the goals.
Maintains awareness of all sales, promotions, applicable ringing procedures, and takes initiative to recover and replenish merchandise.
Adheres to visual merchandising brand standards, assists in housekeeping of the sales floor, and communicates maintenance issues.
Builds personal capability in loss prevention and reinforces store strategy to reduce shrink.
Supports all activities related to providing a safe working environment and demonstrates Company values.
